features: 【Fewer Calories and Fat】Acezoe air fryer oven uses a heating element along with a fan circulating hot air above and around your food, the extra-hot cooking chamber lets dry heat penetrate the food from the outside in for a crispy golden texture. Compared with traditional deep fryer, xl air fryer uses up to 85% less oil, even fitness junkies can enjoy food guilt-free.

【7.4 QT Large Air Fryer】Acezoe air fryer large family size fits 6.5-7.5lbs roast chicken or 20 chicken wings. Airfryer can cook delicious food for 6-8 people at one time, no need to cook in batches, which is more saving and efficient. Air fryers is also a perfect gift for every cook who's too busy for preparing delicious food at the parties.

【Multifunctional Kitchen Appliances】9 preset programs, just one touch, you can cook french fries, meat, drumsticks, steak, cake, shrimp, fish, chicken, and vegetables. The airfryer can not only roast meat, bake cakes, reheat food, but also dehydrate fruits and vegetables, the combination of low fan speed and low temperature, which replaces food dehydrator perfectly.

【Stainless Steel Air Fryer, Easy to Clean】Teflon free air fryer basket and tray with ceramic coating, PFOA free and PTFE free. The detachable and non-stick basket and tray is easy to hand wash and dishwasher safe. Note: If washing by hand, big air fryer is recommended to use soft cleaning tools to prevent the coating from being scratched.

【Adjustable Temp, Saving Your Time】With 360°hot air high-speed circulation and 180-400F wide temperature range, you can make healthier food in less time, an ideal time & energy saver! And come with air fryer cookbook, including various appetizers, main course, desserts, etc. Your purchase comes with lifetime assistance from Acezoe's official support team.

Acezoe air fryer oven basically does the job of many kitchen appliances that are larger, more bulky, and harder to use, making them all a total redundancy Crispy and juicy No oily smoke Easy to operate Easy to Clean

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Acezoe AF100 XL Air Fryer (essentially plug and play) is worth the money, especially for people with a busy lifestyle and no time to do cooking

Safe: Auto shutoff setting,pulling out at any time to check the food escort the safety for you and your family Product model: AF100 Capacity:7.4QT Temperature Range: 180-400F Time setting range: 1-60min Multi-Function Air Fryer -Good Kitchen Helper Less Money to Meet All Need Acezoe electric hot Air fryers does much more than just air fry - it fulfills four more purposes that are just as useful - broiling, baking, reheating and roasting. Any one of these modes can be selected by simply clicking a button. Acezoe air fryer oven basically does the job of many kitchen appliances that are larger, more bulky, and harder to use, making them all a total redundancy Crispy and juicy No oily smoke Easy to operate Easy to Clean

Hot Air Frying Technology Acezoe air fryer cooks food at very high temperatures while simultaneously circulating dry air around the food, cooking food faster all the while making it crisp without needing to add extra fat. If you like super juicy baked or roasted chicken, this air fryer makes your chicken tastes just as juicy and tender. Oilless Cooker Frozen french fries prepared in the air fryer contain between 4 and 6 grams of fat versus their deep-fried counterpart at a whopping 17 grams per serving. Less oil, less fat Full Menu with 9 Presets Acezoe hot air fryers oven cooker has 9 functions for all kinds of meat and vegetables and even bread. Select the cooking method with a touch to a button, instead of scrolling through all the options. Make your Kitchen more cleaner When you’re cooking up things like french fries or chicken nuggets, you can’t beat it. The results are much better than deep frying and your kitchen stays cool

Less Oil - More Healthier Acezoe air fryer cooks by 360°circulating hot air, offer you crunchy food with little to no oil. Frying basket and pan combo separates food in the basket from fat and oil dripping down the pan. Say goodbye to traditional deep frying! You can say goodbye to deep frying. Multi-Function Air Fryer -Good Kitchen Helper Acezoe electric hot Air fryers does much more than just air fry - it fulfills four more purposes that are just as useful - broiling, baking, reheating and roasting. Any one of these modes can be selected by simply clicking a button. Acezoe air fryer oven basically does the job of many kitchen appliances that are larger, more bulky, and harder to use, making them all a total redundancy Non-stick Detachable Basket Acezoe fryer makes cooking much cleaner. The basket has a non-stick interior coating, and an impressive capacity of 7.4 quarts, that allows it to contain a meal for family of 4-10. The frying basket can be easily removed and placed in a dishwasher for cleaning. Inserting them back into the cooker is just as easy. All the other surfaces can be simply wiped with a soft cloth

The Benefit of Preheating Acezoe 7.4Qt air fryer can get the job done easier and can offer the perfect level of crispiness on most occasions. if you want to enjoy a crispy air-fried dish, preheat to ensure great results. User-Friendly Cool Touch Handle Design Anti-scalding handle with high-quality materials is ergonomic. You can push and pull freely without the risk of scald injury. Stainless Steel Body Design Stainless steel stylish appearance design makes your kitchen and counter more beautiful and generous.

Acezoe Air Fryer Come with Recipes - Help you Explore more Delicious Food Comes with original, delicious & easy recipes for every meal. Never worry about what to eat every day. Acezoe air fryer add color and nutrition to your meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Looking, Quiet, Quick, Easy Clean Up, It is a Keeper
reviews.reviewText: I was asked to review this air fryer and was happy to do so because it gave me the opportunity to compare this one with the air fryer we have.This is a large and very cool looking air fryer and the digital screen is easy to use and understand. I like the feature of preheating, the other air fryer we have does not have this feature and compared to our other air fryer, it is also much quieter.So now the cooking test. I caught a very nice large Red Drum and decided to try out the air fryer making panko coated red drum. I had 4 nice pieces of fish fillets about 1 ½ pounds and they all fit into the basket very nicely. After the preheating I put in the fish and flipped them once half way through. In 12 minutes they were done and came out beautiful, brown, hot, crispy/crunchy and delicious. The really nice thing about the fish is they were not coated in oil and were still more crispy than fried fish.Clean up was a breeze and while they were air frying I was having my salad rather then pan frying fish.This air fryer had no problem fitting in 1 ½ lb of fish and by the size of the basket I could easily do a whole chicken. This air fryer is a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Acezoe Air Fryer: Effortless Cooking with Healthy Results
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer is a versatile and efficient kitchen appliance that has taken the culinary world by storm. With its ability to fry, bake, roast, and grill food using minimal oil, this air fryer offers a healthier alternative to traditional deep frying methods. With intuitive controls and pre-programmed settings, it simplifies the cooking process, making it accessible to both novice and experienced home cooks. The clear and user-friendly digital display allows for precise temperature and time adjustments, ensuring consistent and delicious results every time. Furthermore, it utilizes rapid air circulation technology, which evenly distributes heat throughout the cooking chamber. This technology ensures that food is cooked evenly and with a crispy exterior, replicating the texture and taste of deep-fried dishes without the excessive oil. From crispy french fries to juicy chicken wings, this air fryer consistently delivers satisfying and healthier results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I've never used an air fryer before buying this one. My son loves his and has been telling me about them for a while now. Finally pulled the trigger after watching a youtube that mentioned this product.So, very easy to use. I've had it about a week now and here's what I've done with it.Fresh fries 3 different times. 2 pieces of salmon once. 6 wings at a time twice now.Everything has come out just fantastic. I'm not a huge salmon fan (wife is) but I'll grill it for her whenever she wants it. Was raining this weekend so I air fried them. Wow!! Fantastic. Just a little crisco and some lemon pepper and it was perfect! No flipping them, no nothing. Just push the fish button and let her rip.I'm sold!I have no idea if other brands are better or do anything different but this thing cooks great, is a good price, cleans ridiculously easy and the food tastes great. What more can you ask for?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is big, fit for duck or chicken. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brussels sprouts, chicken parmesan, egg rolls, cannoli. You name it, it'll get you there!
reviews.reviewText: We had a 3.4 qt fryer that we got a couple of years back on a Amazon prime day deal. It was interesting when we first got it, but honestly people didn't really use it that much (we leave it in our small office cafeteria). More of us are bringing food from home to work now, and this is when we decided we need to invest in larger air fryer. Ultimately, decided on this because of the size, price, and it's preset settings. Turns out to be a huge hit. To date, we have made:- Brussels sprouts (for 4)- Chicken parmesan (for 4)- Egg rolls (16 pcs at a time)- Taquitos- Salmon- Onion Rings (for 6)- Surf & Turf- Backed potatoes -Cannoli.Go on google, you'll find so much things you can make with an air fryer. Especially a 7.4qt one, that really helps with making sure the food fits in there. Like I said earlier, this fryer has lots of preset and make it so much easier to figure out what to do. The control is easy to understand and responsive (unlike some other appliances where you need to push hard a few times for it to register). The push-to-release handle is a great touch to help removing the tray from the main body.And now comes the part everyone dreads about: cleaning. Fortunately, it's very easy to clean. The inside tray can be easily removed from the outer tray. We simply run some water, rub it a few time with detergent and leave it to drive. Takes a couple of minutes at the most. Not sure what type of coating they have on the tray, it's very easy to clean. If you take a look at inside the air fryer, because edges are rounded, it's easy to clean too.Our office highly recommends this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta mucho cocina rápidas es lo mejor 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Died after 1.5 Years.
reviews.reviewText: When the air fryer was working, it was great. The basket is nice and large and being removable, quite easy to clean. Unfortunately, the air fryer just died in the middle of cooking steaks and will not turn back on even after trying multiple working outlets. There is no damage to the power cord so maybe a fuse popped but I don't feel like trying to take this thing apart. There is supposedly a 3 year warranty but no way to get in touch with the manufacturer. I'd recommend you stick to a known brand for peace of mind and longevity.

reviews.reviewTitle: Four et friteuse qui a trouvé sa place dans ma cuisine.
reviews.reviewText: Je regrette qu'il n'y a pas de mode d'emploi détaillé avec les quantité à pouvoir cuire. Pour les frites faut-il rajouter de l'huile ?J'ai apprécié la rapidité de la livraison.

Ya tenía una freidora de ésta misma marca que he regalado a mí hija para comprar ésta.Me ha gustado la capacidad que tiene, se puede poner una pizza de supermercado aunque un poco justa.Se limpia fácilmente.Su uso es también fácil .Ocupa poco espacio y queda bien.No he usado todavía todos los accesorios que trae .Hasta ahora todo lo que he cocinado ha salido estupendo, patatas, calamares, nuggets .Con la facilidad de poder hacer dos cosas a la vez o poder poner patatas ( por ejemplo) para 4 o 5 personas.Puedo decir que estoy muy contenta con la compra, espero poder decir lo mismo en un tiempo.

Se ahorra tiempo de cocinado y es muy fácil de usar y limpiar.La comida queda muy bien. Por ahora , he probado con patatas, pechugas de pollo, croquetas, brochetas y empanadillas. A mis hijos les han encantado las patatas. Es importante poner un poco de aceite extendido con un pincel por encima y así queda dorada y crujiente. Aunque hay que ser consciente de que es una freidora sin aceite, por tanto, exactamente igual que con el sabor de la fritura en aceite no va a quedar, pero el sabor es bueno y la apariencia también.En las reseñas indica que con una capacidad de 12 litros para una familia de 5, 6 e incluso más personas, en mi casa somos 4 y la cantidad es justa. La próxima la compraré de mayor capacidad pero estoy contenta con la compra.

reviews.reviewTitle: MUY CONTENTA CON EL PRODUCTO Y CON LA ATENCIÓN.
reviews.reviewText: La he estrenado hoy. He hecho verduras rebozadas y el resultado ha sido muy satisfactorio, tiernas y doradas; pero no sé por qué no me deja cargar la foto, trataré de editarlo más adelante. Ahora estoy deshidratando frutas y apio, en cuanto acabe pasaré foto del resultado. Aconsejo que antes de usarla, se laven bien las bandejas y accesorios, se pase un paño húmedo por dentro del horno y se deje unas horas abierta, con un limón dentro, para quitar el olor a plástico.El tamaño bastante adecuado para mi cocina, que es muy pequeña.El servicio post venta muy bueno, a mí me resolvieron un pequeño mal entendido con mucha profesionalidad (Hay que tener en cuenta que tienen alguna dificultad con el castellano y eso es lo que dio lugar al mal entendido). Me mandaron el recetario en español y de lujo.En cuanto vea cómo puedo subir las fotos, edito la reseña con las mismas, porque de verdad que merece la pena ver el resultado. No me arrepiento de momento de haberla comprado.
Fácil de limpiar y fácil de utilizar
